text: Rob van Esdonk (born 25 October 1964) is a Dutch former kickboxer and mixed martial artist who competed in the heavyweight division. ==Kickboxing record== {| class="toccolours" width=100% style="clear:both; margin:1.5em auto; font- size:85%; text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=2 style="background:#A9A9A9" | Kickboxing record |- valign="top" | ? wins (?
